Timestamps:

00:00 - Intro
00:04 - My inkjet printer/scanner
00:33 - Why I will NEVER install ink in my printer/scanner
01:39 - Epson scanner/printer can be used as a scanner without ink in it
02:05 - HP AIO scanner/printer combos will NOT work as a scanner without ink
02:44 - HP Support's weasel wording
03:15 - Someone sued HP over it
03:32 - HP claims the suit should be dismissed because people complaining online didn't cite model numbers
04:03 - HP claims the factual representations on their forums by employees cannot be something HP is liable for
06:05 - Court sides with the printer owner suing HP!
06:46 - HP said case should be dismissed because plaintiff didn't specify a defect... ?????
08:40 - Times when a part being bad/missing in an All in one printer affecting the scanner is acceptable
10:25 - I wish manufacturers were honest, upfront
